function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Concentration of activities around railway stations leading to quick transfer of infected persons to urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Limiting or controlling the density of activities around railway stations, implementing health screenings, and promoting hygiene and sanitation measures","Technologies":"GIS mapping tools, health screening technology, and data analytics for population density","People":"Public using railway stations, residents of urban areas","Owner":"Local governments, transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Population density of built-up areas affecting spread and decay patterns of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 spread in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, increasing healthcare resources, and promoting vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"GIS mapping tools, data analytics for population density, telemedicine","People":"Residents of densely populated areas","Owner":"Local governments, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of elderly people to contagious diseases like COVID-19","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to severe illness and mortality from contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted healthcare interventions, providing social support, and promoting vaccination among the elderly","Technologies":"Telemedicine, healthcare monitoring devices, and digital healthcare platforms","People":"Elderly population","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, community support organizations"}]}
